title: Font ID need please!
content:
Hi, i'd like to know the font used in the easyjet website banners.  
Is that a custom font, a derived one or an existing one?  
Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016081153im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Senza%20titolo-1_4070.jpg)
author: allefio

comments.content:
The proprietary font is named 'Easyjet' (surprise!). It comes in both rounded and plain extended families. The family includes at least Book, Light, Demi, Bold, and Headline variants, as well as matching italics. In some instances the font is simply named EJ.  
(Information from fonts used in PDF's on their website)  
 - Herb
EJ Rounded Headline, their corporate typeface for headlines.
Thank you! But where did you get those PDFs? I can't find any in the site.
i find that if you google the company name + pdf you can usually find an annual report, and sometimes more.
